title: Uncaught exception on first start for fresh sync: `java.net.SocketTimeoutException`
body:
### Description

This is a cosmetic bug, of the "we should really catch all expected exceptions" variety.

**Expected behavior:** 

Exception is caught and handled by Besu

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: `besu/v21.1.6-dev-57f6cf55/linux-x86_64/oracle_openjdk-java-15`
* Java version: 15
* OS Name & Version: Ubuntu 20.04

This issue occurs while Besu tries to connect via DNS over TCP for dns discovery.

It will be better handled once Tuweni 1.4 is out. In the meantime, this won’t break the client. The task will try to run again.
